Package ca.cgjennings.ui.debug

Class TracingRepaintManager

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.RepaintManager
ca.cgjennings.ui.debug.TracingRepaintManager
public class TracingRepaintManager extends RepaintManager
Can be used to track down the cause of excessive repaints. Call the static installDefault method for simple use. Override isComponentOfInterest and call install for more fine-grained use.
